title: RESOLVED [01/11/2018] Boards Content Embedding and Discussion Creation Issues
body:
Hi all! 

We're aware of issues that are impacting the ability to embed content when making posts. The team is working to have these issues resolved as soon as possible, but in the meantime, you may continue to notice that content will not be embedded properly on the Boards. 

Additionally, if you plan on making a thread during this time, you will have to leave the "Link" section empty; otherwise, the post will simply show a loading indicator and not post.

I'll be updating this post with more information as I get it. Thanks for your patience!

replies.body:
How the hell did you get it to work?
Unless the fixed it of course.
It's working? Not in my Chrome browser.
Working... isn't the word I would use for that.
Thank you for addressing the issue!
